name: Classic Tent
Description: There is a growing trend for eco-friendly, adventures, wildlife snnctuary and other pilgiinage tourism. These tourism products involve visiting and staying in remote areas, frests, deserts and ru=iverside. There is an overall storage of somewhere to stay in crowed tourist destination, expecially in the middle of destination
Rules: Campsite is opened for vehicle and reception is opened always from 8:00 till 20:00.The earliest check in time is 08:00 and latest check out time is 11:30.All roads in the camp site must remain free.Emptying chemical toilets is allowed only on designated place
